column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The pizza itself had mushrooms spinach and tomatoes (we opted to go vegetarian) and was quite tasty. However
column3: I feel that we've had pizza as good as this
column4: if not better. That's not to say that we didn't enjoy this meal very much and the pizza was delicious
column5: but for some reason I was expecting an out of this world
column6: ethereal food experience. I would come back again.
